message.body: So it looks like tomorrow is rainy and may be more of a museam day. I have a hankeing to go to the Frick (never been) though it woul be a far cry from the galleries of Chelsea. I am, of course, open for suggestions.
I've never been either. What time were you thinking?
I suppose that makes the most sense. See you then.
So I suppose that our meeting plans lacked the sort of specificity that rainy meeting plans should never be without...if you are on your way, I could meet you at yourtrain stop.
Just got off the train! I'm headed to the museum now!
Nice. The enterance is on 70th street.
